definitions.text: a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
examples: a moderate grade of intelligence
a high level of care is required
it is all a matter of degree

definitions.text: a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
examples: lumber of the highest grade

definitions.text: a specific identifiable position in a continuum or series or especially in a process
examples: a remarkable degree of frankness
at what stage are the social sciences?
the water reached ankle level
the pictures were at the same level

definitions.text: indicator that establishes the horizontal when a bubble is centered in a tube of liquid
a flat surface at right angles to a plumb line
examples: park the car on the level

definitions.text: an abstract place usually conceived as having depth
examples: a good actor communicates on several levels
a simile has at least two layers of meaning
the mind functions on many strata simultaneously

definitions.text: a structure consisting of a room or set of rooms at a single position along a vertical scale
examples: what level is the office on?
level criticism or charges at somebody

definitions.text: tear down so as to make flat with the ground
examples: The building was levelled
level the ground

definitions.text: direct into a position for use
examples: point a gun
He charged his weapon at me

definitions.text: talk frankly with; lay it on the line
examples: I have to level with you
The ground levelled off

definitions.text: having a surface without slope, tilt in which no part is higher or lower than another
examples: a flat desk
acres of level farmland
a plane surface
skirts sewn with fine flat seams

definitions.text: not showing abrupt variations; ; - Louis Auchincloss
examples: spoke in a level voice
she gave him a level look

definitions.text: being on a precise horizontal plane
examples: a billiard table must be level

definitions.text: oriented at right angles to the plumb
examples: the picture is level

definitions.text: of the score in a contest
examples: the score is tied
